body: The most I can make from it is as follows: man seems to have a lonely life cus of the past incidents when he was labelled as a panty stealer, meets the girl he had known for a long time amd are close ( close to be in a relationship) , chats for sometime and Fml tries to soothe him, next day they fuck and in the end he asks her for a proper relationship and she happily accepts is saying  shit like "I will support you or you're a gentleman in my eyes", fml returns home and it was revealed that mc was actually somewhat popular back then and had some chicks fawning over him so fml put another chick's panty in his locker and to detiorate his reputation so that chicks stop pestering him also she's collecting his semen filled condoms like trophies

This is what the doujin says in a nutshell. (Since Fakku is a bitch) 
-Glasses girl and MC met after some time. 
-MC was framed with panty stealing and his reputation and moral was decimated. 
-Glasses girl proposes to keep meeting. 
-Family shit, he is no longer sad, and his family is reacting positively. 
-MC and glasses girl meet, she tells him that she had to run to meet him and blablabla she skipped student council to meet with him. 
-tits got bigger thanks to his groping. NICE. 
-Blablabla sex talk. 
-MC tells her that she is the only thing he needs to be happy; she enjoyed to hear that. 
-Glasses girl at home admits to be the one who framed him about the panty stealing and she will never let him go or some yandere shit.
